norfs.filesystem module¶

class norfs.filesystem.BaseFileSystemObject(filesystem: norfs.fs.base.BaseFileSystem, path_str: Union[str, NoneType], *, _path: Union[norfs.fs.base.Path, NoneType] = None)[source]¶

Bases: object

as_dir() → norfs.filesystem.Directory[source]¶

Returns itself as a Directory instance or raises a NotADirectoryError.

as_file() → norfs.filesystem.File[source]¶

Returns itself as a File instance or raises a NotAFileError.

copy_object() → norfs.copy.base.CopyFileSystemObject[source]¶
exists() → bool[source]¶

Returns whether self exists in the file system.

is_dir() → bool[source]¶

Returns wether self is a Directory.

is_file() → bool[source]¶

Returns wether self is a File.

name¶

The name of self.

parent() → norfs.filesystem.Directory[source]¶

Return parent Directory of self.

path¶

The full, absolute, path of self in the file system.

remove() → None[source]¶

Tries to remove self from the file system. On failure it raises a FileSystemOperationError

uri¶

The URI that points to self in the file system.

class norfs.filesystem.Directory(filesystem: norfs.fs.base.BaseFileSystem, path_str: Union[str, NoneType], *, _path: Union[norfs.fs.base.Path, NoneType] = None)[source]¶

Bases: norfs.filesystem.BaseFileSystemObject

as_dir() → norfs.filesystem.Directory[source]¶

Returns itself as a Directory instance or raises a NotADirectoryError.

copy_object() → norfs.copy.base.CopyFileSystemObject[source]¶
file(path: str) → norfs.filesystem.File[source]¶

Returns a File with its path as being the given path relative to the current Directory.

is_dir() → bool[source]¶

Returns wether self is a Directory.

list() → List[norfs.filesystem.BaseFileSystemObject][source]¶

Returns the contents of the Directory in the file system as a list of BaseFileSystemObjects.

If the Directory does not exist the list will be empty.

remove() → None[source]¶

Tries to remove self from the file system.

On failure it raises a FileSystemOperationError

subdir(path: str) → norfs.filesystem.Directory[source]¶

Returns a Directory with its path as being the given path relative to the current Directory.

class norfs.filesystem.File(filesystem: norfs.fs.base.BaseFileSystem, path_str: Union[str, NoneType], *, _path: Union[norfs.fs.base.Path, NoneType] = None)[source]¶

Bases: norfs.filesystem.BaseFileSystemObject

as_file() → norfs.filesystem.File[source]¶

Returns itself as a File instance or raises a NotAFileError.

copy_object() → norfs.copy.base.CopyFileSystemObject[source]¶
is_file() → bool[source]¶

Returns wether self is a File.

read() → bytes[source]¶

Returns the contents of the File.

If it fails to read the file a FileSystemOperationError will be raised.

remove() → None[source]¶

Tries to remove self from the file system.

On failure it raises a FileSystemOperationError

write(content: bytes) → None[source]¶

Sets the contents of the File. If the parent directory does not exist it is created.

If it fails to write the file a FileSystemOperationError will be raised.
